mainText:
Many thanks to Steve Jobs for creating products which have enabled me  
to better live my life as a teacher & to pursue my dream of being an  
artist & writer... & hundreds of millions of other people too! I  
believe Mr. Jobs stands without equal in our lifetime as a visionary  
genius. Certainly, there are other creators of products... many  
business managers but not one who possesses the style & dignity that  
have made Apple what Apple is... GREAT!
author: Anonymous
